message.content:
{"id": "124570", "title": "Bug 124570 - Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session", 
"description": "Bug 124570Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session", 
"OB": "When testing BIRT 2.0 RC2, I encountered an issue with the Web Viewer's Preview feature from the toolbar. It consistently displays only the first report I opened in a session.", 
"EB": "Currently, the Preview feature in the Web Viewer is not functioning correctly as it always shows the first report opened in a session instead of the selected report.", 
"SR": "To resolve this bug, the Preview feature should display the selected report instead of always defaulting to the first one opened in the session."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '124570', 'title': 'Bug 124570Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session', 'description': 'Bug 124570Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session ', 'OB': 'I am testing BIRT 2.0 RC2 and am running into a problem where Preview (from the toolbar) in the Web Viewer will only show the first report I opened in a session. ', 'EB': '', 'SR': ''}
